r.s: Net_Curl provides an OO interface to PHP's cURL extension
r.d: Provides an OO interface to PHP's curl extension
r.n: - Removed deprecated cURL option CURLOPT_MUTE (Bug #13489) - Changed the license to the New BSD License (Bug #13831) - Cleaned up code to (mostly) comply with phpcs - Converted package.xml to version 2.0
